p: Validation panels were handled as detailed in the by the manufacturer and 100 μL of material along with 5 μL of EPC was converted to a 3base form using the EasyScreen Sample Processing Kit, SP001 (Genetic Signatures, Sydney, Australia) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. After bisulphite conversion the samples were extracted on the GS-mini automated nucleic extraction platform using the EasyScreen Sample Processing Kit, SP006 (Genetic Signatures, Sydney, Australia) again according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
